events.message: John Doe submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, highlighting his experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to John's relevant background in software development and devops.
Recruiter Emma was assigned to Johnâ€™s case to manage further screening and coordinate the interview process.
Emma conducted an initial screening call, discussing John's experience in devops, software architecture, and his motivation for joining the company.
John responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the technical interview and confirming his availability for the next steps.
The technical interview was scheduled for May 5th, focusing on software engineering principles, coding skills, and devops practices.
